item.title: about
item.description:
Hi there, I am RaviTeja Pothana and on the Internet, I am RaviTezu. I am a Software Engineer from Hyderabad, India and an aspiring Entrepreneur.

I love building robust and high quality software. I am an autodidact and always eager to apply the knowledge and skills I have acquired. I believe in “Picking the right tool for the right job” and I always try to update my knapsack with different technologies.

I love my work and enjoy each new project as I get it. Feel free to have at look my blog and don’t hesitate to contact me if you think I can be of any help.

Thanks for stopping by :)
Redirecting you to my contact page..
